name: ripple baby cardigan
notes:
i hope this will be a sweet gift for a baby of yours!

you will get 3 different pdf's , one separate for each size.

as a designer one thing i try is not only offer  basic instructions but detailed ones.
for this baby cardigan i had to write my sizes one by one as the ripple pattern slightly changes from size to size 
this pattern is worked from the top down, starting with the neckline.
there is no seaming or tricky assembly and it's a repetitive pattern, once you get the hang of the first 4 rows , you will be all set.
needs about 7 hours.

this listing is for a crochet pattern in pdf format.
level: intermediate
sizes: 0-6mo/ 6-18mo/ 2-4yrs
